features: High-Quality: Our phone tripod is made of supreme aluminum alloy with only 0.8lbs (360g), and a storage bag for convenient carry. Widely used in YouTube live streaming, Tik Tok, online teaching, vlogging, video conference, facetime, family or group selfies.

Dependable Stability: 3-section, quick release lever-lock legs for easy height adjustment, 13inch to 42inch. This phone tripod can meet various shoot environments and photographic needs, which plays an important part during your travel.

COMPATIBILITY: This tripod comes with a phone tripod mount, the phone clip adjusts between 2.4-3.9 inches, works for iPhone 15 Pro Max/15 Pro/15/14 Pro Max/14 Pro/14/13 Pro Max/13 Pro/13/12/11/SE/XS/XR/X/8 or other smartphones. A wireless remote control, which allows you to take photos or video recording at a distance of 33ft/10m.

Multi-Functional Tripod Suit: The phone tripod is equipped with a stable 3-way pan head can freely adjust angle for 360° panoramic shooting and the bubble level helps to keep it level. Standard 1/4" Camera Mounting Screw fits DSLR, SLR, action camera, GoPro and etc. The maximum load capacity is 4.4 lbs. No recommend for use with large and heavy equipment.

100% Satisfaction Service: Polarduck provides 24-hour customer support, 30-day free of return, 1-year warranty for our product-camera tripod. Contact us freely if any issue occurs, we will offer proper solution for you at the first time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Polarduck Phone Tripod is an ideal tripod for taking attractive picture or making interesting video to record our wonderful and colourful life.

WHAT YOU GET 1 X Phone Tripod1 X Phone Tripod Mount1 X Sport Camera Adapter1 X Bluetooth Remote1 X Travel Bag1 X User Manual SPECIFICATION: Material: Aluminum Weight: 0.8 lbs Leg Sections: 3 Max Height: 42 inches Min Height: 13 inches Max Load: 4.4 lbs Our phone tripod is suited for following phone: - iPhone 15 Pro Max/15 Pro/15/14 Pro Max/14 Pro/14/13/12/11/SE/XS Max/XS/XR/X/8 - Samsung Galaxy Series: S23/S22/S21/S20 I Note20/Note10/Note9 I A54/A53/A52/A51 | Z Flip5/Fold5 - HUAWEI P/Mate/Nova/Honor Series: P60/P50/P40/P30 I Mate60/Mate 50/Mate 40 I nova 10/nova 9 /nova 8 - Xiaomi/Redmi Series: Xiaomi 13 Ultra/12S/12/11 I Redmi K60/K50/K40 | Note 13/12 - Oneplus Ace 2 Pro/2V - Motorola Cell Phone - BLU BOLD/S/F/C/G/J/STUDIO/VIEW Series - And other brands not mentioned above WIRELESS REMOTE CONTROL SHUTTER fits for most phone operating systems: iOS 17/16/15/14/13/12/11/10 version; Android 15.0/14.0/13.0/12.0/11.0/10.0/9.0 version; No APP needed; 30 feet/10m effective range;

WARM PROMPT: To avoid injury or damage to the tripod, please do not attempt load more than 4.4lb (2kg). This tripod is more suitable for smartphones and mirrorless camera. QUICK FLIP LOCKS This phone tripod can easily adjust the height with enhanced quick-flip locks.Not securing the leg locks properly might cause the legs to retract unexpectedly and could result in damage to your device. NON-SLIP RUBBER PAD Non-slip rubber feet ensure tripod stands more firmly and provide stability and safety when shooting or recording EASY TO CARRY Made of lightweight aluminum, weighs only 0.8lb and 16in when fully folded.It's easily to store and suitable for hiking, camping and traveling, etc. RECORD YOUR LIFE Capture every wonderful moment in your life with this nice tripod pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft aluminum, use carefully
reviews.reviewText: It weighs almost nothing, but being fully aluminum, it is susceptible to bending easily, so just handle it gently and there won't be any issues.I just started a YouTube Channel on Auto Detailing and a tripod was a NEEDED accessory, and this fits my needs perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product and easy to use, fast delivery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: The tripod is compact, lightweight and will do the job I purchased it for. My only mark-down to the rating would be for stability. Once the head is extended to it's extreme height, the tube it rests on wobbles in it's base. The solution for me is to not extend the tube and just try and use the legs to get the height I want. The included bluetooth shutter works without fault. It was easy to pair with the phone camera. Overall, this purchase was beneficial.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, Works well!
reviews.reviewText: Could be a little sturdier, but for the price, I would buy again. No troubles with this tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap tripod no good
reviews.reviewText: The remote control doesn’t work like you want it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Perfect package for the money.Very light weight, but is satisfactory for mobile phones. My S22 Ultra fits the spring loaded holder and pivots perfectly. Instructions for the remote do not tell you to slide (on) the little square button on the side. A blue LED will start to blink once per second and you will find the remote ID in your bluetooth scan list as AB Shutter3 (or similar). Once paired, sliding the button back turns off the remote. Turning it back on keeps the phone pairing. Open camera app on phone, push the remote button, and it takes a picture. Very cool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is great when you want to catch those moments with your family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these . They were toy quality and the remote didn’t work.
